Package com.flipfit.business

Interface FlipFitScheduleInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
FlipFitScheduleService
public interface FlipFitScheduleInterface
Interface defining operations related to schedules in the FlipFit system.
Author:
Sabarnabhowmik

    • modifySchedule

      boolean modifySchedule(String scheduleId, int action)
      Modifies a schedule based on its ID and action.
      Parameters:
      scheduleId - ,action Action to perform on the schedule (e.g., update, delete)
      Returns:
      True if modification is successful, false otherwise
